system.description:
This spell allows the caster to retrieve one nonliving object from their home, instantly summoning it into their hand. The object must meet the following conditions:

Object Requirements:

  • Weighs no more than 500 cn (50 lbs).
  • No larger than a staff or small chest.
  • The caster must be very familiar with the object and its exact location.
  • The object must have been prepared in advance by sprinkling it with a special powder costing 1,000 gp.

Spell Limitations:

  • The spell only summons one object at a time; contents of a chest do not travel with it.
  • If another being possesses the item, it will not appear, but the caster will know approximately who and where the possessor is.
  • The spell works from any location, even across different planes of existence.
system.effect: Retrieves one object from caster's home
